title: Port lib/utils package
description: Port utility functions used throughout rod.

title: Port lib/cdp package (WebSocket client)
description: Port the low-level WebSocket client for DevTools Protocol communication.

title: Port core rod module from Go to Crystal
Port lib/proto package (CDP types)
description: Port the generated Chrome DevTools Protocol types from Go to Crystal. This is a large set of structs used for communication with browser.

title: Port Go tests to Crystal specs
description: Convert all *_test.go files to *_spec.cr files, maintaining exact test logic.

title: Port lib/launcher package
description: Port browser launcher and downloader (fetchup dependency).
